title: Career Specialization Questionnaire (Undergraduate)
description: You've already chosen a broad field. These questions will help you find the right specialization and career path within your domain.

questions.text: What is your current field of study?

options.value: Engineering/Technology
Medicine/Healthcare
Science (B.Sc. in Physics, Chemistry, Biology, etc.)
Commerce/Business
Arts/Humanities
Law
Agriculture

questions.text: Within your field, what area fascinates you the most?

options.value: The theoretical and research aspects
The practical, hands-on application
The management and business side of it
The public policy and governance angle

questions.text: What kind of role do you see yourself in 5 years after graduating?

options.value: A technical expert in a specialized role
A manager leading a team or project
An independent professional or consultant
A civil servant or working in a government agency
Pursuing a PhD or in academia

questions.text: Which of these skills are you actively trying to build alongside your degree?

options.value: Coding and software development
Data analysis and machine learning
Business and financial acumen
Communication and public speaking
Design and creative tools

questions.text: What is your main motivation for post-graduation?

options.value: Higher studies (Masters/PhD) in India
Higher studies abroad
Securing a job in a top private company (MNC)
Preparing for government jobs (UPSC, JKPSC, etc.)
Starting my own venture

questions.text: Are you interested in interdisciplinary work?

options.value: Yes, for example, combining technology with healthcare
Yes, for example, combining finance with technology (Fintech)
No, I prefer to focus deeply on my core subject

questions.text: How important is work-life balance to you?

options.value: Very important, I need a predictable schedule
I am willing to work long hours for a rewarding career
Flexibility in work hours is most important

questions.text: Do you prefer working on long-term projects or short-term, fast-paced tasks?

options.value: Long-term projects (e.g., building infrastructure, research)
Short-term tasks (e.g., consulting, software sprints)
A mix of both

questions.text: What kind of impact do you want to create?

options.value: Technological innovation
Societal well-being and health
Economic growth and financial stability
Policy and governance reform
Cultural and creative expression

questions.text: Are you aiming for a career within Jammu & Kashmir or are you open to relocating?

options.value: I want to build my career in J&K
I am open to relocating anywhere in India or abroad
It depends on the opportunity

questions.text: Which of these core activities sounds most engaging to you?

options.value: Analyzing systems and data to find insights and solutions.
Designing, building, and maintaining physical structures or machines.
Providing direct care, diagnosis, and support to people.
Creating compelling content, visuals, or media.
Developing and executing strategies for business growth or public service.

questions.text: How important is continuous learning and upskilling in your ideal career?

options.value: Essential, I want to be at the cutting edge
Important, but I also value stability
I'd prefer a job where the core skills don't change too often

questions.text: Do you prefer client-facing roles or backend/technical roles?

options.value: Client-facing (e.g., consulting, sales, patient care)
Backend/Technical (e.g., research, development, analysis)
A role with a balance of both

questions.text: What is your risk appetite for your career?

options.value: Low - I prefer a secure, stable path (e.g., government job)
Medium - I'm open to working in established private companies
High - I'm interested in startups or starting my own business

questions.text: What kind of team do you work best in?

options.value: A team of technical experts and engineers
A team of doctors and healthcare professionals
A team of business strategists and analysts
A team of creative artists and communicators
